EmailTemplate.subject: RECORDING LINK: How to Get Your Crews to Document Effectively
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> FOLLOW-UP RECORDING:
How to Get Your Crews to Document Effectively
{{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} - As promised, the complimentary recording link from our August 30th How to Get Your Crews to Document Effectively webinar is ready for you and your team to view.
For information about TriTech's EMS Billing or ePCR cloud-based software - or other integrated EMS applications - please contact us at sales@tritech.com <mailto:sales@tritech.com> or 800-537-3927.
To download the recording link, please proceed by clicking here <http://offers.tritech.com/Aug30WebinarRecording-Registration.html>. LINKS: PRESENTER: Doug Wolfberg <http://www.pwwemslaw.com/content.aspx?id=15> of Page, Wolfberg, and Wirth
RECORDING DATE: Thursday August 30, 2012
CEU CERTIFICATE AND PRESENTATION HANDOUTS: CLICK TO DOWNLOAD <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/Aug30_Handouts.pdf>
